import React from 'react'; import * as Header from './layout/header' import * as About from './content/about' import * as EDC from './layout/edc' import * as Education from "./content/education"; import * as Experience from "./content/experience"; import * as Badges from "./content/badges"; import * as CoreExpertise from "./content/coreExpertise"; import * as Leadership from './content/additionalExperiences'; import * as Organizations from './content/organizations'; import * as Languages from './content/languages'; import * as Footer from './layout/footer'; import resume from './assets/Darius Sherman Resume.pdf'; export class Resume extends React.Component { render() { return(
); } }
